title: Virtual Assistant
job_overview:
I’m looking for a virtual assistant.

Who can:
Help me set up appointments in my Instagram direct messages
Schedule &  Instagram content 
Create PDFs on Canva 
Update company trackers

This is who I don’t want to apply:
If you need to be in bed by 9pm every night as this is a UK timezone based role
If you’re written English isn’t very good 
If you have zero understand of social media


This is who I want to apply:
If you’re good at connecting people
You are proficient in google sheets/ excel, instagram, canva.
Have an interest in health and fitness space 
Your written English is excellent
You are able to work 3 hours per day (1 hour at 12pm UK time, 2 hours 7-9pm UK time ) x 7 days per week.

Here are the next steps: 
Email me on Upgrade to see actual info and tell me why you think you’d be great for the role
Subject on this email must start with: MKF VA ROLE -  then your name e.g. MKF VA ROLE - MICHA KELLY
